The EG perform conventional functional rehabilitation ( proprioceptive exercise , verticalization , gait training , paretic hand wrist mobilization , without mobilize proximal paretic arm ) occupational therapy 80 minute day , proximal paretic arm treat NeReBot 40 minute day . For CG , NeReBot therapy substitute 40 minute conventional mobilization proximal paretic arm therapist .
